pages.text: The Spectral Stone can be used to bind some spectral creatures like $(l:creatures/banshee)Banshees$(/l), $(l:creatures/poltergeist)Poltergeist$(/l) and $(l:creatures/spectre)Spectres$(/l). To trap a spectral being into the stone, the proper $(l:circle_magic/binding/spectral)Rite of Binding$(/l) has to be used.

pages.title: Releasing the Beings
pages.text: Charging the Spectral Stone and using it when a note sound is heard will release the trapped beings. The creatures will be bound to the witch who released them, and may be controlled with a $(l:artifacts/misc/necromantic_stone)Necromantic Stone$(/l).
